episode53.name: 54  2017 Season Preview
episode53.description: It is officially game week! The gang previews the Florida A&M game at War Memorial Stadium before going game-by-game and picking the Hogs' wins and losses in 2017. What's the final record? What type of bowl should you expect? They touch every base on this week's episode. â€‹
